pages.text: The step of Rethinking is one of the more mental steps of Ascension. It consists entirely of $(marked)Meditation$().$(br2)The step is initiated with meditating in $(marked)trance$() while in $(marked)ecstasy$().$(br)The ecstasy must be one of inconceivable strength, one that can be granted with $(l:alchemy/entry_wine)$(item)Redmost Wine$().

In order to continue, I will need to apply a certain emotion to myself and then meditate. I will learn what to feel next once I am in the state of rethinking. $(br2)If I want to be prepared completely, I'll need to be able to feel $(o)right$() at all times.
